content: X-W10 P10 Threaded studs Carbon steel threaded stud for use with powder actuated nailers on concrete (10 mm washer) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-use, cordless system – up to 10 times quicker than drilling and with less vibration Thermo-pulled – engineered for more reliable fastening to concrete Applications Threaded connections (e.g. for channels, pipe rings) on concrete Threaded connections (e.g. for brackets, electrical boxes) on concrete Threaded connections (e.g. for miscellaneous attachments) on concrete For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough) Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough) | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Point type | Ballistic point | For use with (tools) | DX 600N | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 26472 -
